cover.image_prompt:
Title: Brain & Brawn Questfest

Image Dimensions: 1024x1024 pixels

itch.io Cover Requirements: Minimum 315x250, Recommended 630x500

Image Prompt Description:

The cover art should be a pixel art representation of a grand adventure in the land of Healthville, a place where healthy habits are integrated into the environment and lifestyle. There should be two protagonists, representing 'Brain' and 'Brawn', standing in the middle of the scene. 

'Brain' is a frail looking character with glasses, holding a book titled 'Riddles' in one hand and a magnifying glass in the other. His eyes should sparkle with intelligence and curiosity. 'Brawn' is a muscular character holding a dumbbell in one hand and a fresh apple in the other, symbolizing physical strength and healthy eating. His strong posture should reflect his physical fitness.

The background should show different aspects of a healthy lifestyle. On one side, there should be a hill with people jogging, someone meditating under a tree, and a farmer's market filled with fruits and vegetables. On the other side, there should be a large library, a complex maze (representing the riddles), and a group of people playing chess.

Following the oblique strategy of 'Faced with a choice, do both', the game cover should show that Brain & Brawn are not mutually exclusive but work together in this quest. The two characters should be standing back to back, showing their unity and shared purpose.

Style Suggestions:

Use bright and energetic colors to represent the vibrancy of a healthy lifestyle. The color palette should be dominated by greens, blues, and yellows, with some warm earth tones for balance. The pixel art style should be detailed but charming, with a touch of nostalgia. 

The title of the game should be in bold, pixelated letters at the top of the image. It should be in a contrasting color to stand out against the background. The font should be fun and inviting, reflecting the adventurous and playful spirit of the game.

task: Develop a basic 'Riddle Game' game with the theme 'Healthy Habits'. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Faced with a choice, do both (given by Dieter Roth)'.
name: Brain & Brawn Questfest

branding_data.short_description: Engage in a riddle-solving adventure promoting healthy habits in Brain & Brawn Questfest.
branding_data.detailed_description: Brain & Brawn Questfest is an interactive riddle-solving game that immerses players in a world focused on promoting healthy habits. With each level presenting a unique riddle related to nutrition, exercise, and mental well-being, players must solve challenges to progress through a vibrant world filled with puzzles that advocate dual solutionsâ€”exemplified by the strategy 'Faced with a choice, do both.' As players tackle each puzzle, they must apply this philosophy, integrating multiple healthy choices simultaneously. Discover the best ways to balance diet and exercise through engaging gameplay that encourages a holistic approach to health.
